WITH REQ_LIST AS ( SELECT 'T' AS REQ_TP, '임시운행번호등록요청' AS REQ_TP_NM, TMP_RACE_NUMBER AS REQ_ID, USER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_WEB_IT_USER WHERE USER_ID = TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER.USER_ID) AS USER_NM, (SELECT AGENCY_CD FROM TB_WEB_IT_USER WHERE USER_ID = TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER.USER_ID) AS AGENCY_CD, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE, APPOR_STATUS AS STATUS_CD, fn_ct_get_code_name('appor_status', APPOR_STATUS) AS STATUS_NM FROM TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER UNION ALL SELECT 'U' AS REQ_TP, '권한승인요청' AS REQ_TP_NM, USER_ID AS REQ_ID, USER_ID, USER_NM, AGENCY_CD, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE, APPOR_STATUS AS STATUS_CD, fn_ct_get_code_name('appor_status', APPOR_STATUS) AS STATUS_NM FROM TB_WEB_IT_USER UNION ALL SELECT 'A' AS REQ_TP, '권한위임요청' AS REQ_TP_NM, USER_ID AS REQ_ID, USER_ID, USER_NM, AGENCY_CD, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE, APPOR_STATUS AS STATUS_CD, fn_ct_get_code_name ('appor_status', APPOR_STATUS) AS STATUS_NM FROM TB_WEB_DT_AUTH ) SELECT REQ_TP, REQ_TP_NM, REQ_ID, USER_ID, USER_NM, AGENCY_CD, REG_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_NM FROM REQ_LIST WHERE 1=1
REQ_TP = #sReqType#
USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #sUserNm#, '%')
AGENCY_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #sOrg#, '%')
STATUS_CD = #sReqFlag#
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

SELECT '임시운행번호등록요청' AS REQ_TP_NM, TMP_RACE_NUMBER, TMP_RACE_AGENCY, INS_LETTER_NUMBER, DATE_FORMAT(INS_INIT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INS_INIT_DATE, DEED_FILENAME, USER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_WEB_IT_USER WHERE USER_ID = TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER.USER_ID) AS USER_NM, (SELECT AGENCY_CD FROM TB_WEB_IT_USER WHERE USER_ID = TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER.USER_ID) AS AGENCY_CD, APPOR_STATUS, CNCL_NOTE, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE, CAR_MODEL, POWER_SOURCE FROM TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER WHERE TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #reqId#

SELECT '권한승인요청' AS REQ_TP_NM, USER_ID, USER_NM, AGENCY_CD, AUTH_CD, fn_ct_get_code_name('auth_cd',AUTH_CD) AS AUTH_NM, fn_ct_get_code_name('class_id',CLASS_ID) AS CLASS_NM, APPOR_STATUS, CNCL_NOTE, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE, AUTOCAR_LEVEL, fn_ct_get_code_name('autocar_level', AUTOCAR_LEVEL) AS AUTOCAR_LEVEL_VIEW FROM TB_WEB_IT_USER WHERE USER_ID = #reqId#

SELECT '권한위임요청' AS REQ_TP_NM, AUTH_ID, AUTH_CD, USER_ID, USER_NM, AGENCY_CD, fn_ct_get_code_name ('appor_status', APPOR_STATUS) AS STATUS_NM, APPOR_STATUS, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE FROM TB_WEB_DT_AUTH WHERE USER_ID = #reqId#
SELECT TMP_RACE_NUMBER, USER_ID FROM TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER WHERE TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #tmpRaceNumber#
sqlMap.update:
/* QUERY ID : ReqConfirmDAO.updateReqConfirm_T*/
UPDATE TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER SET APPOR_STATUS = #apporStatus#, TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #tmpRaceNumber#, CNCL_NOTE = #cnclNote# WHERE TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #reqId#

/* QUERY ID : ReqConfirmDAO.updateReqConfirm_U*/
UPDATE TB_WEB_IT_USER SET APPOR_STATUS = #apporStatus#, USE_YN = 'Y', AUTH_CD = #authCd#, CNCL_NOTE = #cnclNote#, AUTOCAR_LEVEL = #autocarLevel# WHERE USER_ID = #reqId#

/* QUERY ID : ReqConfirmDAO.updateReqConfirm_A*/
UPDATE TB_WEB_DT_AUTH SET APPOR_STATUS = #apporStatus#, AUTH_ID = #authId#, APPOR_YN = 'Y' WHERE USER_ID = #reqId#
UPDATE TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER SET USER_ID = #reqId# where USER_ID = #authId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER_INSDATE_HIS (TMP_RACE_NUMBER ,SEQ ,INS_INIT_DATE ,REG_ID ,REG_DATE) VALUES (#tmpRaceNumber# ,(SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER_INSDATE_HIS WHERE TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #tmpRaceNumber#) ,DATE_FORMAT(#insInitDateU#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ,#user_id# ,SYSDATE())
sqlMap.select: SELECT E.TMP_RACE_NUMBER AS TMP_NUMBER ,E.SEQ AS SEQ ,DATE_FORMAT(E.INS_INIT_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS INS_INIT_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(E.INS_INIT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INS_INIT_DATE_VIEW ,E.REG_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(E.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,E.UPDATE_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(E.UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_DATE_VIEW FROM TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER_INSDATE_HIS E WHERE E.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #tmpRaceNumber# ORDER BY E.SEQ DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_CM_HT_TEMPOPER SET INS_INIT_DATE = DATE_FORAMT(#insInitDateU#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #tmpRaceNumber#
